name: Cards & Wolves
description:
Cards & Wolves is a card game where you need to plan each move as they impact both of your avatars, Bear and Raven.
Bear and Raven can share the same cards.

Help Bear and Raven to fight an epic battle againt Fenrir.

Cards & Wolves is a game created for the 2021 Brackey's gamejam.
Everything except the music was created during the gamejam.

Game Design: Charles-Alexandre Lippé, Philippe Beauchemin
Programmation: Benjamin Chouinard
Art: Étienne Lafrance, Catherine Verret

Special thanks to Danheim, Mike Schaefer Olsen, for his permission to use his music.
